query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS mobile_notification_settings (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT NOT NULL,
  enabled INT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL,
  cpk_alerts INT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL,
  spc_alerts INT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL,
  oee_alerts INT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL,
  daily_report INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  sound_enabled INT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL,
  vibration_enabled INT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX idx_mobile_notification_user (user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS mobile_notification_settings (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT NOT NULL,
  enabled INT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL,
  cpk_alerts INT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL,
  spc_alerts INT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL,
  oee_alerts INT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL,
  daily_report INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  sound_enabled INT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL,
  vibration_enabled INT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX idx_mobile_notification_user (user_id)
);
